HorribleWailing: When Vicar Amelia takes damage, she can let out a horrible wailing sound, causing all creatures within 120 ft. who can hear her to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of her next turn. If a creature's save is a success, they are immune to her horrible wailing for 24 hours.
PrayerStrike: Every creature within 10 ft. of Vicar Amelia must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save the creature takes half that and is not knocked prone.
